scenes.background: You suggest a quick call to sort things out. Monica joins the call and says:
scenes.description: Thanks for joining. Bob feels we might need more of your time on this.

options.text: Let’s see if we can wrap this up quickly. What are the main hurdles?
options.analysis: You demonstrate empathy and motivation to help, though self-regulation could improve as you compromise your leave time.

options.text: I've already guided you. You should be able to handle it from here.
options.analysis: You maintain your boundaries and encourage independence, showing good self-regulation but lower empathy and motivation.

options.text: If it's that complex, we might need another solution that doesn’t involve me.
options.analysis: You set clear boundaries and suggest finding an alternative solution, showing good self-regulation but lower empathy.
